item.title: Rose McGowan Found Happiness “Talking to Trees” in Mexico and Has Emerged With New Creative Fire
item.description: After an intense time in the spotlight in the wake of Hollywood’s #MeToo reckoning, McGowan retreated from the public for an extended period. Baby Yors helped bring her back with his new single “Monte
